timlogger
Class TimLogger

java.lang.Object
  timlogger.TimLogger

 class TimLogger
extends java.lang.Object

TimLogger.java Purpose: log error message

Version:
1.0 21st-05-2012

And A list of the options:

Leveller:

0 - ERROR

1 - WARNING

2 - SEVERE

Formatter:

0 - SUMMARY

1 - DETAIL

Handler:

0 - Console and file

1 - file

2 - Console

Author:
Shiguang.Tim.Hao
